targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        rg.location AS location,
        COUNT(rg.id) AS total
FROM az_resource_group AS rg
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON rg.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY rg.location
ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT
        COUNT(rg.id) AS total
FROM az_resource_group AS rg
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON rg.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)

SELECT
        v.location AS location,
        COUNT(v.id) AS total
FROM az_vpc AS v
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON v.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY v.location
ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT
        COUNT(v.id) AS total
FROM az_vpc AS v
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON v.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)

SELECT
        COUNT(subnet.id) AS total
FROM az_subnet AS subnet
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON subnet.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)

SELECT
        vm.vm_size AS vm_size,
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY vm.vm_size
ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)

SELECT
        vm.location AS location,
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY vm.location

SELECT
        vm.power_state AS power_state,
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY vm.power_state
ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT
        vm.resource_group AS resource_group,
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY vm.resource_group
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
        vm.hyper_v_gen AS hyper_v_gen,
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY vm.hyper_v_gen
ORDER BY total DESC;

panels.title: Virtual Machines By Hyper V Generation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        vm.gallery_image_id AS gallery_image_id,
        COUNT(vm.id) AS total
FROM az_vm AS vm
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON vm.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY vm.gallery_image_id
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
        pa.resource_group AS resource_group,
        COUNT(pa.id) AS total
FROM az_public_address AS pa
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON pa.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY pa.resource_group;

panels.title: Public IP Addresses By Resource Group

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(pa.id) AS total
FROM az_public_address AS pa
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON pa.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)

SELECT
        pa.location AS location,
        COUNT(pa.id) AS total
FROM az_public_address AS pa
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON pa.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY pa.location
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
        pa.ip_version AS ip_version,
        COUNT(pa.id) AS total
FROM az_public_address AS pa
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON pa.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY pa.ip_version

SELECT
        lb.resource_group AS resource_group,
        COUNT(lb.id) AS total
FROM az_lb AS lb
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON lb.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY lb.resource_group;

SELECT
        lb.location AS location,
        COUNT(lb.id) AS total
FROM az_lb AS lb
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON lb.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY lb.location
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
        COUNT(lb.id) AS total
FROM az_lb AS lb
INNER JOIN az_subscription AS s ON lb.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name IN ($az_subscription_name)

SELECT 
  b.resource_group as resource_group,
  COUNT(b.id) as total
FROM az_blob_container as b
INNER JOIN az_subscription as s on b.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name in ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY b.resource_group;

SELECT 
  sa.resource_group as resource_group,
  COUNT(sa.id) as total
FROM az_storage_account as sa
INNER JOIN az_subscription as s on sa.subscription_id = s.subscription_id
WHERE s.name in ($az_subscription_name)
GROUP BY sa.resource_group;
